text: Adam Arkin (born August 19, 1956) is an American actor and director. He is known for playing the role of Aaron Shutt on Chicago Hope. His father is Academy Award-winning actor Alan Arkin. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:Writers from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Adam Arkin
